data: Uses a special potion to heal 30% of HP.
Throws a chemical cocktail 3 squares ahead and explodes on 3x3.
Revives an ally with smelling salts.
Throws an extra flaming chemical cocktail 3 squares ahead and explodes on 3x3.
Chrysanthia hacks an enemy's brain circuits and gives them a shock!
Fires his revolver down the row, and he's not playing roulette.
Robin delivers a swift punch to the square ahead.
Machine gun fire. Mow them down in a row!
Snipes the enemy furthest away from Robin. They'll never see it coming!
Shoots an RPG down the row which explodes in a plus shape.
Airomi slashes 2 squares horizontally and vertically with a massive aura.
Airomi throws a concentrated sphere of aura down the row.
Burns everything in a T shape
A wall of earth rises in the column ahead. The enemies will pay for it.
Sends a 2 square wide air slash down the row.
A 3 square wide wave wipes through the row.
